title: NIR-induced photothermal-responsive shape memory polyurethane for versatile smart material applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24265-24286
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04754K, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ki Yan Lam, Choy Sin Lee, Rachel Yie Hang Tan
A review of recent advances of NIR-light induced photothermal-responsive shape memory polyurethane for industrial and medical applications. It covers the classes of photothermal agents, responsive mechanism, synthesis, advantages, and challenges.
